snippet: The activist, Cao Shunli, 52, fell ill after being detained last fall and died of a lung infection, said her brother, who charged that the authorities failed to give her timely medical treatment.
abstract: Family of Chinese activist Cao Shunli, who fell gravely ill after being detained in fall 2013, says she has died of lung infection.
lead_paragraph: The activist, Cao Shunli, 52, fell ill after being detained last fall and died of a lung infection, said her brother, who charged that the authorities failed to give her timely medical treatment.

headline.print_headline: China: Detained Activist Falls Ill and Dies, Family Says

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
